testsuite.name: Computhink.Script.Login_Validation

testcase.name: TC_01_ContentVerseURLAndTitleValidation
testcase.system-out: Launched Contentverse URL Details : http://10.4.10.119:8080/CVWeb/cvLgn Page title name is : Contentverse

testcase.name: TC_02_ContentVerseURLValidation
testcase.system-out: Launched Contentverse URL Details: http://10.4.10.119:8080/CVWeb/cvLgn No error message found Page title name: Contentverse EWA URL launched successfull Launched Contentverse URL Details: http://10.4.10.119:8080/CVWeb/cvLgn No error message found Page title name: Contentverse EWA URL launched successfull

testcase.name: TC_03_Verifying_No_button_of_Session_for_user_is_already_active_dialog_box
testcase.system-out: Scenario 01: Log into a EWA Enter valid user name into username field UserName Details: Dipak Enter valid password into password field Select a Room Selected Room name: demoserver.demoroom Captcha is not present, proceeding with login. Click Login button Session message did not appear. Proceeding with login. Session message did not appear. Proceeding with login. Launched Contentverse URL Details: http://10.4.10.119:8080/CVWeb/cvLgn No error message found Page title name: Contentverse EWA URL launched successfull Test Scenario 1 : Verifying No button of Session for user is already active dialog box Scenario 01: Log into EWA Enter valid user name into username field UserName Details: Dipak Enter valid password into password field Select a Room Selected Room name: demoserver.demoroom Captcha is not present, proceeding with login. Click Login button Session for user is already active. Do you want to create a new session? Dialog box displayed. User clicks OK button. Verified No button of Session for user is already active dialog box

testcase.name: TC_04_Verifying_Login_EWA_with_blank_Username
testcase.system-out: Test Scenario 2 : Verifying Login EWA with blank username Do not entered username into username field Enter valid Password into Password field Select a Room Selected Room name: demoserver.demoroom Click on the Login button Please enter username validation message should show

testcase.name: TC_05_Verifying_Login_EWA_with_blank_Password
testcase.system-out: Test Scenario 3 : Verifying Login EWA with blank password Enter valid Username into Username field Do not entered password into password field Select a Room Selected Room name: demoserver.demoroom Click on the Login button Please enter password validation message should show

testcase.name: TC_06_Verifying_Login_EWA_without_Selecting_Roomname
testcase.system-out: Test Scenario 4 : Verifying Login EWA without selecting roomname Enter valid Username into Username field Enter valid Password into Password field Not select Room Selected Room name: Please select a room Click on the Login button Select a roomvalidation message should show when none of above room selected for Login

testcase.name: TC_07_Verifying_Login_EWA_with_Invalid_Username
testcase.system-out: Test Scenario 5 : Verifying Login EWA with invalid username Enter Invalid Username into Username field Enter valid Password into Password field Select a Room Selected Room name: demoserver.demoroom Click on the Login button

testcase.name: TC_08_Verifying_Login_EWA_with_Invalid_Password
testcase.system-out: Test Scenario 6 : Verifying Login EWA with invalid password Enter valid Username into Username field Enter Invalid Password into Password field Select a Room Selected Room name: demoserver.demoroom Click on the Login button this validation message should show

testcase.name: TC_09_Verifying_Yes_button_of_Session_for_user_is_already_active_dialog_box
testcase.system-out: Test Scenario 7 : Verifying Yes button of Session for user is already active dialog box Launched Contentverse URL Details: http://10.4.10.119:8080/CVWeb/cvLgn No error message found Page title name: Contentverse EWA URL launched successfull Scenario 01: Log into a EWA Enter valid user name into username field UserName Details: Dipak Enter valid password into password field Select a Room Selected Room name: demoserver.demoroom Captcha is not present, proceeding with login. Click Login button Session message did not appear. Proceeding with login. Session message did not appear. Proceeding with login. Verified Yes button of Session for user is already active dialog box

testcase.name: TC_10_Verifying_Browser_Allowing_Only_OneUser_Login
testcase.system-out: Test Scenario 10 : Verifying Browser Allowing Only OneUser Login Launched Contentverse URL Details: http://10.4.10.119:8080/CVWeb/cvLgn No error message found Page title name: Contentverse EWA URL launched successfull Scenario 01: Log into EWA Enter valid user name into username field UserName Details: admin Enter valid password into password field Select a Room Selected Room name: demoserver.demoroom Captcha is not present, proceeding with login. Click Login button Session message did not appear. Proceeding with login. Session message did not appear. Proceeding with login. Verified If User Session is active but we Closed Browser then it should allowing to Login to EWA for Any User without Showing Login validation Click on Username option Click on Logout option Timeout waiting for alert to appear.
